Ezboard did post a message today about some technical problems do to
their server upgrade...basically the html for the logout page is
messed up, the thread settings such as moving new posts up to the top
isn't working so I have to go through the forums and do some double
checking.

Sometimes the links on the bottom of the page are all broken sometimes
they work...I took the time to compile those links in the footer so
people can surf those references simultaneously while browsing the board.

don't you just love technology?

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@y...> wrote:
> I'm not having any problems with RK Dreams, but I'm having problems
with shinsengumimb taking *forever* to load a page, sometimes timing
out or immediately telling me the page isn't available, then finally
loading as soon as I retry.  A few days ago (before they shut down for
maintenance), it wouldn't even let me log on.  Weird...
>  
> phil
